alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 10 at 2:31AM MDT until October 12 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches between 7000 and 8000 feet, with up to 8 inches and locally higher above 8000 feet. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Cold and raw backcountry conditions will exist, which could become hazardous to those who are not prepared. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavier precipitation from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening may help to lower snow levels to as low as 6000 feet at times, but accumulating snow is expected to remain above pass level on major roadways.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
